WorkItem.Description:
Upon enabling it does not jiggle, but rather starts pressing right mouse at about the same frequency as 1.4.7 would jiggle.  

Going back to 1.4.7, it works normally.

This is on a Win7 64 bit machine.
WorkItem.Summary: Presses right mouse instead of jiggling

Comments.Message: Fixed in 1.6, going up later today.

Wow, thank you for the quick response!  Works great now.

Thank you also for sharing this util!
